void.string: The character can choose ``unarmed strike'' or ``grapple'' for the character's weapon for purposes of this feat. The character can choose ``ray,'' in which case the character is especially good with rays. Benefit: The character adds +1 to all attack rolls the character makes using the selected weapon. Special: The character can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time the character takes the feat, it applies to a new weapon.
Proficient with weapon, base attack bonus +1 or higher.
